Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.math

Interface RandomNumberGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultRandomNumberGenerator, KissRandomNumberGenerator
    public interface RandomNumberGenerator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default boolean nextBoolean()
      Returns a random boolean.
      double nextDouble()
      Returns a random double between 0 and 1.
      default double nextDouble​(double min, double max)
      Returns a random double within the specified range.
      double nextGaussian()
      Returns a Gaussian distributed random double between -1.0 and 1.0.
      default double nextGaussian​(double mean, double deviation)
      Returns a Gaussian distributed random double from [mean - deviation * mean, mean + deviation * mean].
      default int nextInt()
      Returns a random integer;
      default int nextInt​(int max)
      Returns a random integer within the specified range.
      default int nextInt​(int min, int max)
      Returns a random integer within the specified range.
      default long nextLong​(long min, long max)
      Returns a random long within the specified range.
      void shuffle​(List<?> list)
      Randomly permutes the specified list using this source of randomness.

      • nextDouble

        default double nextDouble​(double min,
                          double max)
        Returns a random double within the specified range.
        Parameters:
        min - the smallest value that can be returned (inclusive)
        max - the greatest value that can be returned (exclusive)
        Returns:
        the random double

      • nextGaussian

        default double nextGaussian​(double mean,
                            double deviation)
        Returns a Gaussian distributed random double from [mean - deviation * mean, mean + deviation * mean].
        Parameters:
        mean - the mean value of the distribution
        deviation - the standard deviation of the distribution
        Returns:
        the Gaussian distributed random double

      • shuffle

        void shuffle​(List<?> list)
        Randomly permutes the specified list using this source of randomness.
        Parameters:
        list - the list to permute
